mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_SPVATHINFSGMT (SPVSGATHRTYINFSGMTSEQNO, SUPORGTYPE, SUPORGNAME, SUPORGCERTTYPE, SUPORGCERTNUM, SUPORGINFOUPDATE,ReportFlag) values (#{SpvsgAthrtyInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SupOrgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SupOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SupOrgCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SupOrgCertNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SupOrgInfoUpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_SPVATHINFSGMT set SUPORGTYPE = #{SupOrgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPORGNAME = #{SupOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPORGCERTTYPE = #{SupOrgCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPORGCERTNUM = #{SupOrgCertNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPORGINFOUPDATE = #{SupOrgInfoUpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ReportFlag=#{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SPVSGATHRTYINFSGMTSEQNO = #{SpvsgAthrtyInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SPVSGATHRTYINFSGMTSEQNO, SUPORGTYPE, SUPORGNAME, SUPORGCERTTYPE, SUPORGCERTNUM, SUPORGINFOUPDATE,ReportFlag from PBCRS_REPORT_SPVATHINFSGMT where SPVSGATHRTYINFSGMTSEQNO = #{SpvsgAthrtyInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SPVSGATHRTYINFSGMTSEQNO, SUPORGTYPE, SUPORGNAME, SUPORGCERTTYPE, SUPORGCERTNUM, SUPORGINFOUPDATE,ReportFlag from PBCRS_REPORT_SPVATHINFSGMT
mapper.insert:
insert into PBCRS_REPORT_SPVATHINFSGMTM ( SPVSGATHRTYINFSGMTSEQNO, SUPORGTYPE, SUPORGNAME, SUPORGCERTTYPE, SUPORGCERTNUM, SUPORGINFOUPDATE,ReportFlag,etl_date
) select SPVSGATHRTYINFSGMTSEQNO, SUPORGTYPE, SUPORGNAME, SUPORGCERTTYPE, SUPORGCERTNUM, SUPORGINFOUPDATE,'0',to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') from PBCRS_REPORT_SPVATHINFSGMT where SPVSGATHRTYINFSGMTSEQNO = #{SpvsgAthrtyInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
